about.details:
Incorporated in 1988, Gujarat based "Ganga Forging Limited is a company engaged in manufacturing of closed die forged products catering to both automotive and non-automotive segment. The automotive segment includes manufacturing of products catering to the commercial vehicle, passenger car, three wheeler, two wheeler, and tractor. The non-automotive segment includes electric power transmission, dairy equipment manufacturing, agricultural, gear and gearbox, crankshafts, connecting road, heavy engineering industries, hubs, and flanges. With a presence in most of the allied products in this industry, the Company caters to wide range of customers.

The existing manufacturing facility of the company is equipped with 4 Drop Hammers, 2 automatic power press, 2 manual power press, 4 furnaces in the forge shop. The manufacturing facilities are well equipped with required facilities including machinery, other handling equipment to facilitate the smooth manufacturing process.

The company has 68 permanent employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO?
faqs.answer:
Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO is a SME IPO of 2382000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹5.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹21 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on June 29, 2018, and closes on July 3, 2018.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO opens on June 29, 2018 and closes on July 3, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO?
faqs.answer: Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO will be done on Friday, July 6, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, July 10, 2018. Check the Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Ganga Forging (GFL) IPO listing date is on Wednesday, July 11, 2018.
